name: INPlayMediaIntent
desc: An intent that contains information about media playable from your app.

items.name: init(mediaItems: [INMediaItem]?, mediaContainer: INMediaItem?, playShuffled: Bool?, playbackRepeatMode: INPlaybackRepeatMode, resumePlayback: Bool?, playbackQueueLocation: INPlaybackQueueLocation, playbackSpeed: Double?, mediaSearch: INMediaSearch?)
items.desc: Creates an intent that describes media content such as a song, podcast episode, or movie.

items.name: var playShuffled: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media plays in a shuffled order.

items.name: var resumePlayback: Bool?
items.desc: The resume playback setting at the time the user plays the media item.

items.name: var playbackRepeatMode: INPlaybackRepeatMode
items.desc: The repeat mode setting at the time the user plays the media item.

items.name: enum INPlaybackRepeatMode
items.desc: The possible repeat modes at the time the user plays the media item.

items.name: var playbackSpeed: Double?
items.desc: The playback speed for a media item.

items.name: var playbackQueueLocation: INPlaybackQueueLocation
items.desc: The queue location for a media item during playback.

items.name: enum INPlaybackQueueLocation
items.desc: Constants that describe the playback queue location for a media item.

items.name: var mediaSearch: INMediaSearch?
items.desc: An object that contains the search parameters.
